install.packages("readxl")
library(readxl)

Retail <- read_excel("C:/Users/brhol/Downloads/Online Retail.xlsx")
  

#looks like we were able to get the file

#lets get a quick look at the data set

# See the first few rows
head(Retail)

# See column names
colnames(Retail)

summary(Retail)

glimpse(Retail)


#check for missing values
colSums(is.na(Retail))

#percentage of missing values per column
sapply(Retail, function(x) round(mean(is.na(x)) * 100, 2))

Retail_clean <- Retail %>%
  # Remove rows with missing CustomerID (common step)
  filter(!is.na(CustomerID)) %>%
  # Remove rows where Quantity or UnitPrice are zero or negative
  filter(Quantity > 0, UnitPrice > 0) %>%
  # Trim extra spaces in text fields
  mutate(
    Description = trimws(Description),
    Country = trimws(Country)
  )

#lets look at the clean result

nrow(Retail_clean)          # how many rows remain
sum(is.na(Retail_clean))    # total NAs left


#checking for duplicates
Retail_clean <- Retail_clean %>%
  distinct()
